#summary Goal overview:overview

= Maven Overview Plugin. =

Generates overview graph of project dependencies.

= Mojo Attributes: =

    * Requires a Maven 2.0 project to execute.
    * Automatically executes within the lifecycle phase: site


= Parameter Details =

artifactCollector

Artifact collector, needed to resolve dependencies.

    * Type: org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactCollector
    * Required: No

artifactFactory No Description.

    * Type: org.apache.maven.artifact.factory.ArtifactFactory
    * Required: No

artifactMetadataSource No Description.

    * Type: org.apache.maven.artifact.metadata.ArtifactMetadataSource
    * Required: No

dependencyTreeBuilder No Description.

    * Type: org.apache.maven.shared.dependency.tree.DependencyTreeBuilder
    * Required: No

excludes Artifacts to be excluded. Regular expressions matching the full artifact designation.

    * Type: java.lang.String
    * Required: No
    * Expression: ${excludes}

height Rendered graph height in pixels.

    * Type: int
    * Required: No
    * Expression: ${height}
    * Default: 1200

localRepository Local Maven repository.

    * Type: org.apache.maven.artifact.repository.ArtifactRepository
    * Required: No
    * Expression: ${localRepository}

project Maven Project. Default value: ${project}

    * Type: org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject
    * Required: No
    * Expression: ${project}

siteRenderer Generates the site report.

    * Type: org.apache.maven.doxia.siterenderer.Renderer
    * Required: No

suppressedScopes Suppressed scopes. Scopes that are not supposed to be shown on graph as edge labels.

    * Type: java.lang.String
    * Required: No
    * Expression: ${suppressedScopes}

vertexFullLabel Should vertex name be full artifact ID.

    * Type: boolean
    * Required: No
    * Expression: ${vertexFullLabel}
    * Default: false

width Rendered graph width in pixels.

    * Type: int
    * Required: No
    * Expression: ${width}
    * Default: 1200
